attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like you to dissolve parliament due to MP's taking advantage of tax payer’s money to meet their own personal needs. 

I would like to see a better and improved system where the general public have the power to approve and disapprove spending on using tax payer’s money; each party should randomly select the between 10-30 people from their constituency. be able control control tax payer’s money. and where it should be spent

To select the people who should be select they should be registered on the tax poll system. And an independent body should do the search.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
